headline.main: STOCKS HESITANT; STAPLES MIXED; Trading on Exchange Declines in Volume; Prices Ease -- Bond Business Small

lead_paragraph: The stock market had a difficull time yesterday attempting to chart a course, and while the list righted itself somewhat from the break of Tuesday, irregularity marked the session, with price fluctuations narrow as activity declined. Whereas observers floundered around trying to place the blame for the sell-off during the previous day, the causes of the hesitancy yesterday were laid very definitely at the doorsteps of Washington and the Soviet-Nazi battleline.
